minetogether:gui.chat.title: MineTogether Chat
minetogether:gui.friends.title: MineTogether Friends
minetogether:gui.friends.copy_code.info: Copy your friend code to clipboard.
minetogether:gui.friends.enter_code.info: Add a friend using their friend code.
minetogether:gui.settings.title: MineTogether Settings
minetogether:gui.order.title: Order a Server
minetogether:gui.order.player_count.info: How many players do you estimate will be using this server? We do not limit players slots, this is just to help us tailor a service to your needs.
minetogether:gui.order.place_order.confi: Are you sure you wish to place this order? Please ensure all entered details are correct before proceeding!
minetogether:gui.order.pregen_false: Agree to Mojang EULA and pre-generate world?
minetogether:gui.order.blank.name: Name cannot be blank!
minetogether:gui.order.blank.first_name: First Name can not be blank!
minetogether:gui.order.blank.last_name: Last Name can not be blank!
minetogether:gui.order.region.signal: Calculated by running a reverse trace from our servers to your IP, this may be inaccurate.
minetogether:gui.order.region.pinging: Attempting to determine latency to this region...
minetogether:gui.order.region.pinging_fa: Failed to determine distance or latency to this region.
minetogether:gui.order.summary.paying_fo: You're paying for the server resources. This means:
You can install any supported games from our catalogue
minetogether:gui.order.summary.cancel_an: Cancel at any time with 72 hours notice.
minetogether:gui.order.login_success: Logged in successfully. Proceed with order!
minetogether:gui.order.account_exists: Account exists with this email. Please login or try another email address.
minetogether:gui.order.account_error:
Error occurred while creating account. Error: %s
Please go back and correct the errors
minetogether:gui.order.order_error:
Error occurred while placing order. Error: %s
Please contact support if the problem persists
minetogether:gui.order.order_success: Order successful! Please click "View Invoice" the button to pay!
minetogether:gui.order.order_modpack: Your server will then be set up with the latest modpack version!
minetogether:gui.button.banned: You have been banned from MineTogether Chat
minetogether:gui.button.banned.info: Click here to appeal the ban via the MineTogether website.
minetogether:gui.server_list.title: MineTogether Server List
minetogether:gui.server_list.type.public: Public Servers don't have any limitations on entry. Anyone can join and immediately start playing, and their player bases can be large, but their open nature can increases the chance of being griefed.
minetogether:gui.server_list.type.commun: Community Servers are still relatively open, but will require being added to an approved list of members to join, offering some increased security and peace of mind with vetted users.
minetogether:gui.server_list.type.closed: Closed Servers require a direct invite from the server owner to join. Usually for groups of friends, these servers may be smaller in population, but with the highest level of trust between users.
minetogether:gui.server_list.sort.name: Name
minetogether:toast.fiend_request_receive: %s has sent you a friend request
minetogether:screen.friendreq.desc.accep: Please enter the name you want to know your friend as
minetogether:screen.friendreq.desc.reque: Please enter the name you want to know your friend as
minetogether:screen.friendreq.desc.updat: Please enter the name you want to know your friend as
minetogether:linkaccount1: Link your Minecraft account to your MineTogether account.
minetogether:linkaccount2:
Linking your accounts will unlock abilities like being able to set your own nickname.

This will open a web-browser for you to sign in securely.,
minetogether:new_user.2: MineTogether is a multiplayer enhancement mod that provides
minetogether:new_user.3: a multitude of features like chat, friends list, server listing
minetogether:screen.servertype.title: Server Type
minetogether:screen.servertype.listing.p: Public Servers don't have any limitations on entry. Anyone can join and immediately start playing, and their player bases can be large, but their open nature can increases the chance of being griefed.
minetogether:screen.servertype.listing.c: Community Servers are still relatively open, but will require being added to an approved list of members to join, offering some increased security and peace of mind with vetted users.
Closed Servers require a direct invite from the server owner to join. Usually for groups of friends, these servers may be smaller in population, but with the highest level of trust between users.
minetogether.multiplayerscreen.clickhere: Click here to get one from CreeperHost!
minetogether.connect.open.title: MineTogether Connect
minetogether.connect.open.attempting: Attempting to open world to friends
minetogether.connect.open.success: Opened local game world to your MineTogether friends.
minetogether.connect.open.failed: Failed to open local game to MineTogether friends: %s
minetogether.connect.open.proxy.disconne: MineTogether connection lost. Your world is no longer shared to friends.
minetogether.connect.open.proxy.closed: Closed local game world. Friends can no longer connect.
minetogether.connect.join.full: MineTogether friends' server is full. Please contact your friend!
minetogether.connect.join.tried.name:
Your friend %s tried to join but was unable to do so as the player limit has been reached :(
For more information, please see https://minetogether.io/full/%s
minetogether.connect.join.notfriend: You cannot join as you are not MineTogether friends with this user!
minetogether.connect.unavailable.website:
MineTogether connect is unavailable: %s

Do you wish to visit the MineTogether website now?
minetogether.connect.title: Multiplayer (MineTogether Connect)
minetogether.connect.scan: Scanning MineTogether Connect and LAN for available worlds
minetogether.connect.friendentry.title: MineTogether Friend Server
minetogether.connect.friend.server.title: %s's Shared MineTogether Server
